data.text: @katecastro_ 1/2 Hi Kate, I'm glad to hear that you've had a positive experience on-board your recent flight with us. We go to great lengths to provide passengers with excellent customer service so it’s nice when someone takes the time and trouble to tell us exactly what we’re getting right.
@f23annisa Thanks for the tweet. Great to hear that you've had an awesome experience flying with us. :) We look forward to seeing you on board again soon! Cheers -J

@jamesclyde90 Thanks for replying. I understand that you’re trying to report a security issue and we can look into that for you. If you could send us a Direct Message of the details along with your full name and booking reference (if applicable), we can check on it right away. Thanks – Justine

@jamesclyde90 Hi James, thanks for your tweet. So we can further look into this for you, could you please DM us with the details of your concern along with your booking reference and flight details? Thanks- Maye
@Ahern_Rob Thanks so much for the kind words, Rob. I’ve forwarded your compliments to our leadership team – this feedback will definitely make their day. Regards – Justine
@captincool (2/2) However, if you wish to provide the specifics like the cabin crew that you spoke with, you may send us a Direct Message with your full name and booking reference. Thanks – Justine
@captincool (1/2) Hi Cloe, thanks for responding. We do have an internal team that we forward reports like this to so that we can improve our service for you and others.

@captincool We've already sent a report regarding your experience. If you'd like to provide specific information about what happened, you may send us a Direct Message containing your full name and booking reference. Regards, Justine

@captincool I’m so sorry to hear about both of your encounters on board. You have every right to expect professional and polite service whenever you travel on one of our flights. I’d make sure that this feedback is passed on to our leadership team as Jerry stated above. Sincerely, Justine

@Rinobatam Hi, thanks for your tweet. It may help to know that baggage prices aren't static - they can vary from time to time, like fare prices, and are not fixed. The cheapest way to add checked baggage is at the time of booking as price will increase after booking. Regards- Justine
@captincool and I’m sorry if this wasn’t your experience. Please be assured that I'll be passing this to our Leadership team. Thanks-Jerry

@captincool I'm sorry to hear about your experience. Please be absolutely reassured that this incident was in no way related to nationality or race. You have every right to look forward to prompt and courteous service whenever you travel on one of our flights 1/2

@Ahern_Rob Thanks for getting in touch about your flight 3K 601 today. Please know that we certainly understand the importance of getting a flight away on time and rest be assured that we try to do this with every one of our flights. Hope you enjoy the rest of your flight. Thanks-Jerry

@farzinothecat Hi Natalie, thanks for getting back to us. Sorry to hear this, you may wish to contact our Customer Care team here https://t.co/V2e3GexDUQ, whom will be in touch to discuss further. Thanks - Lee

@farzinothecat 1/2 Hi Natalie. I’m sorry to hear about the delay to your travel plans. We work hard to get all of our flights away as scheduled. Inclement weather can result in some delays to arrivals and departures, which can lead to cancellations down the track to our scheduled flights.

data.text: @farzinothecat 2/2 While I understand if other airlines are flying out of Hanoi - we're not able to comment on other airline's practices but safety is, and will always be our number one priority. Thanks - H

@devi03denisa Hi, I’m sorry to hear that you’re unable to check-in online. I recommend that you remove the tweet as it contains your booking reference, which is a personal information and send us a Direct Message instead so we could discuss the matter further. Thanks – Justine

@aikma_95 Thanks for your reply. As previously advised, we recommend passenger to allow at least 3 hours between two flights. It is always passenger responsibility to allow a certain amount of time for connections between international flights. Thanks-Jerry

@aikma_95 Thanks for getting in touch. Please know that if you choose to book two flights yourself with the intention of connecting them it is recommended that you leave at least 3 hours between flights.. Please see here: https://t.co/VSSNY5sWOW for more details. Thanks-Jerry

@sakshi_prak I’m sorry to hear that you’ve been waiting at the check-in counter. It may help to know that for 3K flights, the counters open 2 hours before the flight. I’ve checked your booking and can confirm that your flight is at 7:50PM so it should open at 5:50PM. Thanks - Justine
@dheerajsanghvi 2/2 See here for further details - https://t.co/IJcwstwxGJ. Thanks - Lee

@dheerajsanghvi @jetairways 1/2 Hi dheeraj, thanks for your tweet. We're unable to advise on your personal passport and visa requirements as it is the passenger's responsibility at all times to have appropriate travel documentation and entry permits such as visas.
@JfLapaks Thanks! -Cy
@JfLapaks Hi JF, thanks for your tweet. The social media team are only able to respond to messages in English. Are you able to repost in English so we can assist?

Take a friend 4 FREE sale now on! 2-to-go ALL-IN! SIN -> PEN $44, HKT $49, SGN $58, BKK $72, HKG $88, DPS $89, MNL $98, TPE $122, OKA $169, MEL $218! Book now https://t.co/HZEHZ1G777! https://t.co/vMTMmrPccu

@JhonNuqui1 Thanks for your reply. She can reach us on our Facebook or Twitter account. Alternatively, she can contact us on our Contact Centre at 1800 1611 0280 or Live Chat here: https://t.co/A6Soi6jsN6 for further assistance. Thanks-Jerry

I'm afraid that I'm unable to disclose any flight information to anybody besides the passenger or contact person. If you're sister could contact us directly, we'll see how we could assist.-Jerry

data.text: @devi03denisa Thanks for getting in touch about your booking. So we could check this for you, could you DM us your booking reference along with your full name? Hope to hear from you soon. Thanks-Jerry
@pauls_trips Thanks for the tag Paul. Hope you enjoyed your trip with us. :) –M
@xkatrina7291x Hi there. Could you provide us your booking reference number, full name and email address via DM so we can look into this? Thanks - H
@_sweet_corn_ Hello there, sorry to hear about your recent experience on-board your flight from Penang to Singapore. I’ll be sure to pass your feedback on so we can continue to improve. Thanks - Lee

@wondaring I apologise for the delay in response and with the service you've received on board. We do train all staff to be professional and helpful at all times. Please be assured that I'll include your feedback in my reporting to our leadership team. Thanks- Jan
@kAiN_Ka_In Hi Karin, just want to let you know that I've responded to your DM. Thanks- Maye

@kAiN_Ka_In Hi Karin, I understand that you have submitted your query regarding your cancelled flight to Bali via email. So I can look into this further, could you please DM your booking reference, full name and flight details? Thanks- Maye

@kAiN_Ka_In Hello there, sorry to hear about your recent experience with us. So we can take a look and see at how we can assist you on your flight to Bali, please contact us here - https://t.co/hXj0Sz9dk4. Thanks - Lee

@kAiN_Ka_In Hi Karin, thanks for your reply. Sorry to hear for any difficulty in completing our feedback form. You can also get in touch with us by sending an email to customer.care@jetstar.com. Thanks - Lee

@kAiN_Ka_In Thanks for your reply. If you would like to submit a case for your experience, you may do so on our feedback form here: https://t.co/bppfcWxX7f and one of our Customer Care team will review your concerns and be in contact directly.  Thanks-Jerry
@eynakow Thanks for getting in touch. I can confirm that you're not blocked on our Twitter account. Thanks-Jerry

data.text: @belindalodia 2/2 documentation. You can check here for your applicable check-in and boarding times - https://t.co/3vaqfJW7Au. You may also wish to check this link - https://t.co/Sihy1bpBQT for further information on Travel Identification. Thanks, Cy

@bite4size Sorry to hear this Jenna. Please bear in mind that it can take time for your case manager to formally review your concerns as she also needs to be thorough. Rest assured that she will be in contact with you directly once she have completed her enquiries. Thanks - Lee
@bite4size Hi Jenna, sorry to hear you've had not yet heard back. Rest assured I have forwarded your comments to your case manager to contact you asap. Appreciate your patience. Thanks - Lee
@belindalodia 2/2 boarding gate when you arrive at the airport. See here for further details - https://t.co/bUTby3zIfb. Hope you’ll enjoy your flight from Jakarta to Singapore. Thanks - Lee

@TheSarge61 2/2 you’re due to travel. I understand that you are concerned about the aircraft you will be travelling on. As you may be aware,  Safety is our first priority and we will never fly unless we know it is absolutely safe to do so. Thanks -Cy

data.text: @TheSarge61 1/2 Hi there, sorry to hear your flight from Phuket has been cancelled. We certainly understand the importance of getting a flight away on time and we aim to do this with every one of our flights. However, it is sometimes unavoidable that we have to cancel a flight on the day
@wondaring Food and drinks offered on board are subject to availability and we can’t guarantee that we will have all options available for purchase on the day. Thanks- Jan 2/2
@wondaring Sorry to hear your experience. Occasionally though an unprecedented demand may mean we don’t have enough bottled water on board as we would like. 1/2

@flyandflashy Hi there, sorry to hear your flights to Singapore and Bali had been cancelled. I can appreciate that you may not be able to see the inclement weather where you are right now, but our pilots and operations team also have to consider conditions on the flight path. Thanks -Cy

data.text: HBD to our Aussie cousin! Have a great one! https://t.co/3JuXeclyfo

@787Sg Hi There, As Lee previously mentioned, could you please DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can further look into this for you? You might also want to check this link for information https://t.co/UqoOnPBli9. Thanks- Maye
@787Sg Hey, could you PM us your booking reference along with your full name so I can check this for you. Thanks - Lee

@woodycakes Hi there, knitting needles can be brought either checked or in your hand-carry, but subject to airport security screening. Please make sure to check CASA’s website for further details: https://t.co/AoukzG82xX See you on board on Saturday! – Justine

[SG] @SAFRAsg members you're in for a treat! SIN - PEN $37, SGN $43, BKK $47, RGN $55, HKG $59, DPS $59, MNL $69, TPE $95, OKA $129, MEL $149 one way all-in! Book now at https://t.co/xJQ15N6fWb! https://t.co/fkd1Cct3PP
@nadylarash Hi, I’ve replied to your tweet to our Jetstar Airways Twitter account (which you should’ve received by now). Regards – Justine

data.text: @lloydthelostboy (2/2) If you tried to check yourself in using the web kiosk but couldn’t, it’s likely that check-in had already closed for your flight.

@lloydthelostboy (1/2) I’m sorry to hear that. Web check-in for international flights is allowed but generally, you’d still need to visit the check-in counter to present IDs and collect boarding pass before check-in closes. You’ll then be issued with a web travel documents to print out.

@justin_lister Hi, you may want to check your Tax Invoice sent to you along with the itinerary. For the refund fee, please send us a Direct Message containing your full name and booking reference so we can take a look further. Thanks –Justine

@justin_lister 1/2 Sorry to hear you’re unhappy with our refund fees, Justin. Included in your fare are a number of taxes and charges. Many are paid to government agencies and airports whether the customer travels or not. When a passenger cancels their flight, Jetstar is often unable to re‑sell

@justin_lister 2/2 the seats and recoup these amounts. As for your flight changes, you’ll need to pay a change fee plus any difference between the flight you booked and the cost of the flight you want to travel on. Please see here: https://t.co/2V7IxTYXtj. Thanks -Cy

@lloydthelostboy Hi Lloyd, thanks for your reply. Sorry to hear about your situation. You may check-in online for your CRK-SIN flight here: https://t.co/JyI8UVhDdC, but please make sure to check your eligibility here first: https://t.co/UqoOnPBli9. Thanks -Cy

@aileenapolo Hi Aileen, thanks for your tweet. Glad to know that one of our crew had been of great help on your flight from Bali to Singapore. I’ll make sure to pass on your feedback; just send us the details along with the booking reference, full name, and flight details via DM. Thanks -Cy
@ptbjl Sorry to hear about your experience, Patrick. If you could send us a DM of your concerns along with the booking reference, full name, and flight details,  we’d be happy to assist. Thanks -Cy
@broodjeaap5 Thanks for getting in touch. So we can assist you, please DM us your booking reference along with your full name. Hope to hear from you soon. Thanks-Jerry
RT @FXP_APAC: @techinasia & @Jetstar_Asia held a conference in a most unusual setting - on a plane https://t.co/hQoCeAa48Q via @CampaignAsi…
@harshitj2701 2/2 In addition, your gift voucher will be delivered to your elected email address within 24 hours after your purchase. Thanks -Cy

@harshitj2701 1/2 Hi Harshit, It may help to know that no payment fee will apply for bookings made in Australian Dollars (AUD) with a Jetstar voucher. For details, please check here: https://t.co/X8bpyPGKe1.

@GamePlanCo Hi Game-Plan. When travelling on a Starter Fare you can carry one piece of hand baggage up to 56cm x 36cm x 23cm per person plus one small item such as a laptop, purse or handbag. The total weight of all your cabin baggage mustn’t exceed 7 kilos. Hope this helps - H

data.text: @tata_temyong Yes you can bring a powerbank as part of your carry-on baggage allowance, but subject to airport security screening. Please see https://t.co/Joz1rIYqoQ for more details. –M

@missfilatelista Thanks for your reply. Please be reminded that we don't advise passenger to post personal details including your booking reference publicly. If you could send us a DM so we can discuss this privately. Thanks-Jerry

@missfilatelista Sorry to hear this. Whenever you fly with us, we want you to be comfortable and I do apologise if this issue affected your journey with us. Could you pleas DM your booking reference so I can pass this onto our relevant team for review. Thanks-Jerry

@thyagaraj_s Hi Thyagaraj, thanks for your tweet. Sorry to hear you’re having difficulties using our vouchers for your booking. If you could DM us your booking reference, full name, and email address along with screenshots of this, we’d be happy to help. Thanks. -Cy

@_OhRapha Hi Raphael. If you'd like to change your flight to an earlier flight, you may do so by managing your booking here: https://t.co/xweA4PnaBr. Please note that you will need to pay for the change and fare difference. Thanks - H

@gyaonghyun Hi K, Sorry to hear about your recent experience regarding your opened baggage. If you can send the details to our Baggage Services team here: https://t.co/Ns3im9z6K3 they can formally review this and contact you directly. Thanks- Maye
Awesome sale fares only at https://t.co/tVF0r3WsnM! SIN - BKK $48, SGN $49, DPS $59, REP $65, HKG $67, TPE $89! CRK - KIX P2998! MNL - KIX P3198 nett + many more destinations! https://t.co/SCsTEfCJB4
@MattDay97 Sorry to hear this Matt. We try to ensure all flights get away on time, however it's not always possible to do so due to operational requirements and our strict safety standards. –M

@kunalkursija Sorry to hear this Kunal. As Cy advised, we don’t have the facilities our Baggage team use to trace customers bags. I suggest that you contact the Baggage Services team directly here https://t.co/lBL1iu5SBJ. –M
@kunalkursija 2/2 here: https://t.co/Ns3im9z6K3. They can formally review this and contact you directly. Thanks - Cy

@kunalkursija 1/2 Hi Kunal. I’m sorry to hear about your missing bag. The social media team doesn’t have access to the systems, facilities and policies the Baggage team use to process claims for customers’ bags.
I’d recommend you to send through the details  and photos to the Baggage Services
@Kevin00_ID Hi Kevin. So we can check this for you, please send us a DM with your complete name and flight details and we’ll see how we can assist. Thanks - Josh
@Kevin00_ID 2/2 – all you need is your booking reference and the email address on the booking and you can go ahead and add it. Thanks -Cy
@lloydthelostboy Hi Lloyd. Wishing you a safe and enjoyable flight to Phu Quoc today.  Thanks – Josh

@Kevin00_ID 1/2 Hi Kevin, thanks for your tweet. If you’ve already made your booking you can add or increase your allowance on your flight from SIN-KNO through the Manage Booking function on our website here: https://t.co/xweA4PnaBr
@HarshadMD89 Could you please send through the details to our Baggage Services team here https://t.co/IJi3xk8y0g so they can formally review this and contact you directly.Thanks-Jerry

@HarshadMD89 I'm sorry to hear this. Please be assured that we go to great lengths to take care of each piece of luggage, and to return all your belongings to you immediately after you've arrived at your destination. 1/2
@iamdavidhardy Thanks for your reply. Please be assured that we take safety and security seriously and its our #1 priority. We'll be sure to notify you if anything changes in the future. -Jerry
@iamdavidhardy 2/2  You may also keep an eye on our Travel Alerts page for further update here: https://t.co/k8WaMbQirH Regards - Justine

@iamdavidhardy 1/2 While I do understand that the Government advised not to travel to Indonesia at this time, we have our team of experts closely monitoring the situation. If anything changes, we’ll notify you via the contact information you've provided in your booking.
